description:
Subaru continues to explore the doujinshi expo and bumps into two other unexpected attendees, Crusch and Priscilla.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 8 - Kessen Toujitsu
